backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining store details, categories, products, user roles, and related CRUD logic with integrated access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing routing, admin UI, hooks, and component behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, theming, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Configuration file specifying allowed Internet Identity alternative origins for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing configuration using TanStack Router for public and admin pages with nested layouts and category routes.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Component displaying access denial message with principal ID, copy functionality, and logout workflow tied to session cleanup.
Modal for creating multiple categories at once with line‑based input and preview of computed order values.
Empty or placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/CategoriesDropdo: Dropdown menu listing categories fetched from API, allowing navigation to a selected category.
frontend/src/components/CategoryModal.ts: Modal form for creating or editing a single category, handling name and order fields.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Cookie consent banner with accept/decline actions persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/DashboardCards.t: Grid of dashboard navigation cards linking to admin sections like products, categories, and stats.
Dashboard header with sidebar toggle, session‑keepalive worker logic, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/DashboardHome.ts: Dashboard homepage showing a welcome message and the main navigation cards.
Layout wrapper with header, responsive sidebar, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Generic confirmation dialog for delete actions with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/DeleteProductDia: Delete dialog requiring a specific confirmation password before allowing product deletion.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing store info, contact details, formatted phone links, and social links.
frontend/src/components/HeaderSearch.tsx: Search bar with debounced queries, abortable requests, and navigation to results page.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesD: Loads categories with products and implements infinite scrolling with responsive display counts.
frontend/src/components/home/CategorySec: Renders a category header and product grid, with navigation to full category and product select handling.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductCard: Renders an individual product card with image loading logic, stock/featured badges, and click navigation.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductGrid: Responsive grid that shows a limited number of products and delegates rendering to ProductCard.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductImag: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Displays in‑stock or out‑of‑stock status using styled badges and icons.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Full‑screen loading spinner used during permission checks.
frontend/src/components/LoginInterface.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with a styled UI and loading state.
frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile slide‑in menu with navigation links, category list, and scroll/escape handling.
frontend/src/components/pages/AdminUsers: Admin page for listing, filtering, adding, and modifying user roles with confirmation dialogs and toasts.
frontend/src/components/pages/Categories: Admin page to list, search, sort, add, edit, delete, and reorder categories with React Query and modals.
frontend/src/components/pages/ImportPage: Handles drag‑and‑drop JSON import for products and categories, including validation, previews, and bulk upload.
frontend/src/components/pages/ProductsPa: Admin page for listing, filtering, paginating, adding, editing, deleting, and updating product attributes.
frontend/src/components/pages/StoreDetai: Form for viewing and updating store info, hours, coordinates, and banner image with compression support.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card displaying image, details, stock status, and navigation to product page.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Modal wrapper that manages history, focus trapping, scroll lock, and close behavior for displaying ProductDetailView.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailVie: Renders detailed product information with image handling, sharing, WhatsApp contact, and optional back/close controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductModal.tsx: Form modal for creating or editing products, including image upload/compression and validation of product fields.
frontend/src/components/PublicHeader.tsx: Public site header with logo, desktop navigation, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, routed content, and conditional cookie consent.
frontend/src/components/SafeSelect.tsx: Select component wrapper enforcing sentinel values to avoid empty-string errors and providing helper utilities.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input with debouncing, autocomplete, full results handling, and optional product selection modal.
frontend/src/components/SidebarNavigatio: Sidebar menu component rendering navigation items with active highlighting and mobile overlay handling.
frontend/src/components/StoreBanner.tsx: Displays a hero banner with store info, WhatsApp link, and promotional text using store details.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Toast notification component managing timers, pause/resume behavior, icons, and dismissal.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: Container that renders all active toasts from the toast store.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, manages login state, stored identities, and interaction with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks for user profiles, admin status, roles, categories, products, and store data, stabilizing actor references and caching behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useToast.ts: Exposes helper methods to trigger success, error, warning, and info toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and detailed styles for a toast notification system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoute.tsx: Protects admin-only routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading, login, or access-denied states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays category details and infinite-scrolling product lists with pagination, actor stabilization, and query cleanup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows store contact information with formatted links and handles loading, errors, and query cleanup.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the store homepage with banner, search, categories-with-products, and product detail modal, managing loading states and query cleanup.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders a privacy policy page with store details and static sections about collected data and usage purposes.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with loading, error, and not-found states, handling title updates, animations, and query cleanup.
frontend/src/stores/toastStore.ts: Implements a Zustand store for managing toast notifications with add, remove, pause, and resume actions plus helper creators.
frontend/src/types/productDetail.ts: Defines shared types for product selection, including category details and product references.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.ts: Provides standardized API response parsing with error handling, retry logic support, and BigInt-aware JSON parsing.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.ts: Utilities for safely converting, validating, parsing, and stringifying BigInt values within JSON operations.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.ts: Offers safe numeric conversions and validations, including IVA and profit margin checks with Spanish locale formatting.
frontend/src/utils/phoneFormatter.ts: Provides functions to clean and normalize phone numbers for WhatsApp API usage and to format cleaned Spanish numbers for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/workers/session-worker.js: A web worker that periodically sends keep-alive messages by emitting synthetic activity every 60 seconds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing frontend refactor goals, constraints, and existing feature requirements.
